The video was published on Twitter on De: 2020, and has been viewed more than 54,000 times.
The video includes a news headline in si: which translates to English as: “Director of [China] CDC: Quality of Chinese vaccines is yet to be improved”. The date on the left-hand side reads “March 7” and “Sunday”.
An anchor can be heard speaking in Manda: stating that the quality of some domestic vaccines is not up to standard, which greatly affects the outcome of disease prevention. Wang Yu, member of the National Committee of the Chinese people's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) and director of the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention, is mentioned in the video.
The video shows the logo for Chinese tel: SMG), and it was also published on the official channel of SMGBB, a media subsidiary of SMG, on March 7, 2010, with the same headline as superimposed in the video.
